# Machine Translation and Document Search Project

## Project Overview
A full-stack application that provides machine translation and semantic document search capabilities using FastAPI backend and modern NLP models.

## Technology Stack
- **Backend**: FastAPI, Python 3.10+
- **Machine Translation**: Hugging Face Transformers
- **Document Search**: FAISS, Sentence Transformers
- **Frontend**: HTML5, JavaScript, Bootstrap
- **Database**: SQLite for metadata

## Key Features
- Real-time machine translation (English â†” Vietnamese, expandable)
- Semantic document search using embeddings
- RESTful API endpoints
- Document upload and indexing
- Search history tracking
